name: Boneitis - Quest for the Cure
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare gamejam in 48 hours in  April 2021.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/boneitis-quest-for-the-cure

Boneitis is a game about a man named Phillip who’s daughter has contracted the deadly Boneitis. Now it’s up to him to go Deeper into the local dungeon and get some money to cure her.

Adventure

With your Pickaxe and Sword, venture into the local dungeon and try to gather enough gold and loot to cure your regretful daughter.

Upgrade

Upgrade your Sword, Pickaxe, and Armor!

Experience 4 different types of enemies!

Mine 2 different types of stone!
